trans-unit.source: Specifies the resource consumed by the member of a class.
trans-unit.target: 指定由类的成员使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: If the ResourceConsumptionAttribute attribute is applied to a member, the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute must also be applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ResourceConsumptionAttribute 属性应用于成员，<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>还必须应用属性。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>

trans-unit.source: If the resource scope of the consumed resource is different than the resource scope of how it is consumed, the constructor that takes a `consumptionScope` parameter should be used to specify how the resource is consumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果所用资源的资源作用域位于不同使用方式的资源作用域，该构造函数的使用`consumptionScope`应使用参数来指定如何使用资源。

trans-unit.source: For example, a resource may be exposed as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resource, but only used at the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> and <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可能将资源作为公开<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>资源，但仅在使用<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>和<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>作用域。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: For this example the `consumptionScope` parameter is set to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>.
trans-unit.target: 对于本例`consumptionScope`参数设置为<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>|<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: The `resourceScope` parameter in the constructor must specify a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> greater than or equal to the resource exposure of all called members.
trans-unit.target: `resourceScope`构造函数中的参数必须指定<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>大于或等于资源公开的所有调用的成员。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: For example, a method consuming two <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resources and one <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resource would be identified as consuming a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> and a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resource by setting `resourceScope` to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用两个<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>资源和一个<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>资源的方法将被标识为通过设置来使用<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>和<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>资源`resourceScope`到<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>|<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: `Public` members cannot expose <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resources.
trans-unit.target: `Public`成员不能公开<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>或<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>资源。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> members cannot expose <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>成员不能公开<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>资源。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: The graph of methods terminates when a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute with a resource scope of <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> is applied to a method.
trans-unit.target: 关系图方法终止时<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>资源作用域的属性<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>应用于方法。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute"></xref> class specifying the scope of the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute"></xref>类指定所用资源的作用域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref>已消耗的资源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute"></xref> class specifying the scope of the consumed resource and the scope of how it is consumed.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute"></xref>类指定所用资源的作用域和使用方式的作用域。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute specifies a scope of <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>, then the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> attribute must specify a resource it consumes and how it consumes it, by specifying a value for the `consumptionScope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>属性指定的作用域<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>，则<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute>属性必须指定它所消耗的资源，而且会占用它，通过指定的值`consumptionScope`参数。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The scope specified by `consumptionScope` should be less than or equal to the scope specified by `resourceScope`.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的范围`consumptionScope`应小于或等于指定的作用域`resourceScope`。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> scope can be consumed as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> scope, but not as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>作用域可以用作<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>或<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>作用域，但不是作为<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>作用域。</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref>已消耗的资源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> used by this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref>使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: Gets the consumption scope for this member.
trans-unit.target: 获取此成员的消耗范围。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> object specifying the resource scope used by this member.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref>对象，它指定使用此成员的资源作用域。

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource scope for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: 获取所用资源的资源作用域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> object specifying the resource scope of the consumed member.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref>指定所用成员资源作用域的对象。
